## \_getTotalHours() function

Get the total hours between two UNIX millisecond timestamps

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _getTotalHours(first: number, last: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  first | number | The first UNIX millisecond timestamp |
|  last | number | The last UNIX milliseconds timestamp |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
